name: Why do you love?
description:
This game was made for the 2nd Brackeys game jam with theme: "love is blind!"

It is a difficult fast-paced platformer that consists of the internal emotional struggle of a boy towards its girlfriend.

The game is a challenging fast-paced platformer.

I bet you can't get through all 11 levels :P

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Controls:

A & D or arrow keys to move

W or Space to jump

R to reset level

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

ChangeLog:

-You can also jump with W

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Code, art and sfx by Gerard Belenguer

Music theme by Edu Collin
